attributes.action: Share St Catherines Well with the public on Sconce Hills Park Newark.
attributes.additional_details: Because if there is a natural spring we should all be able to enjoy it and benefit from it.
attributes.background: Open up the natural spring on sconce hills for public use

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about access to local sites of interest are a matter for the relevant landowners, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
